author: ghudson
msg: Add a filename prefix to nodes within a transaction to avoid conflicts
with special device names (con, nul, etc.) under Windows.  (Even if
you have a directory prefix or a ".foo" extension after a special
device name in a filename, Windows will still treat the file as a
special device.)
* libsvn_fs_fs/fs_fs.c
(PATH_PREFIX_NODE): New symbol giving the node filename prefix.
(path_txn_node_rev): Add the path prefix to the node filename.
* libsvn_fs_fs/structure
Document the path prefix on the node filenames.

author: djh
msg: Fix Win32 build when there are spaces in the path.
Neon versions prior to 0.24.6 would not allow us to quote EXPAT_FLAGS
correctly, so paths with spaces would not work.  Although we could now
quote this correctly, it's better to use the new EXPAT_INC flag (also
introduced in Neon 0.24.6).  Setting EXPAT_FLAGS requires too much
knowledge of Neon build-system internals.
Patch by Jon Foster.
* build_neon.ezt: Set EXPAT_INC rather than EXPAT_FLAGS.

author: sussman
msg: Fix issue 1877:  INSTALL shouldn't recommend that people "bootstrap" to /trunk.
* INSTALL: Stop talking about 'bootstrapping' to the latest source.
Stop telling average users to use --enable-maintainer-mode, mention
it as an aside.   Make apache section reference chapter 6, not chapter 5.
